alchemist.description: An eccentric man with wild hair and stained fingers. He is constantly distracted by his bubbling concoctions.

dialog.greeting: Ah, a customer! Don't mind the smell. Or the smoke. What can I get for you?
dialog.trade: Potions? Tinctures? Reagents? If it bubbles or fizzes, I'm your man!

alchemist.name: Kaelan the Alchemist
